docs.text: Environment ¶ In order to get started we need a few packages installed and setup. This guide assumes that HomeBrew is already installed. Using HomeBrew on MacOS install the following packages: Ansible ¶ brew install ansible Direnv ¶ brew install direnv Docker ¶ brew install --cask docker Fluxv2 ¶ brew install fluxcd/tap/flux Git ¶ brew install git Go ¶ brew install go Helm ¶ brew install helm jq ¶ brew install jq Kubectl ¶ brew install kubectl Kubetail ¶ brew tap johanhaleby/kubetail brew install kubetail Mozilla SOPs ¶ brew install sops Pre-commit ¶ brew install pre-commit Shellcheck ¶ brew install shellcheck Go-Task ¶ brew install go-task/tap/go-task Yamllint ¶ brew install yamllint
